description: HTML frontend for a Database Viewer web application. It provides UI structure, styling, and client-side scripting to browse databases, tables, and display table data dynamically fetched via API endpoints.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets current selections, and updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses a database to show its tables and loads tables data.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data table in HTML format including headers and cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data when truncated or collapsed.
